scripts.wdev: wrangler pages dev --local -b WEATHER_API_KEY=$(grep -E '^WEATHER_API_KEY=' .env | cut -d '=' -f 2- | sed 's/^"\(.*\)"$/\1/') -b API_URL=$(grep -E '^API_URL=' .env | cut -d '=' -f 2- | sed 's/^"\(.*\)"$/\1/') -b API_CLIENT_KEY=$(grep -E '^API_CLIENT_KEY=' .env | cut -d '=' -f 2- | sed 's/^"\(.*\)"$/\1/') -b API_CLIENT_TOKEN=$(grep -E '^API_CLIENT_TOKEN=' .env | cut -d '=' -f 2- | sed 's/^"\(.*\)"$/\1/') -- npm run dev
